enb_long_title: TWELFTH SESSION OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES OF THE UNFCCC
section_title: 16TH SESSION OF THE INTERGOVERNMENTAL PANEL ON CLIMATE CHANGE
sentences: This meeting took place from 1-8 May 2000, in Montreal, Canada.
Participants considered the IPCC programme and budget for 2001-2003, the report of the previous session, and progress reports on the IPCC's Third Assessment Report.

They also approved new IPCC reports on: Land Use, Land-Use Change and Forestry (LULUCF); Methodological and Technological issues in Technology Transfer; Emissions Scenarios; and Good Practice Guidance and Uncertainty Management in National Greenhouse Gas Inventories.
